AUTHOR: Author
REPLY_DESCRIPTION: Help warm up our community with a kind comment! (Max 200 characters)
POLICY_CONSENT: By clicking the button below, you agree to the terms and conditions and privacy policy of Handubi.
PRIVACY_POLICY_DESCRIPTION: Handubi values and protects your personal information, and strives to manage it securely.
PRIVACY_POLICY_COLLECTED_ITEMS: - Collected items: Name, email, phone number, date of birth, etc.
PRIVACY_POLICY_PURPOSE: - Purpose of collection: Membership registration and management, service provision and improvement, site usage analysis
PRIVACY_POLICY_DURATION: - Retention period: 6 months after membership withdrawal or as required by applicable laws
PRIVACY_POLICY_RIGHTS: - User rights: Request to view, modify, delete personal data, or withdraw consent
PRIVACY_POLICY_LINK_TEXT: For more information, please refer to the full Privacy Policy.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: {{site}} (hereinafter "Handubi") values your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains what types of personal data we collect, how we use it, how we protect it, and your rights as a user.

collection.title: 1. Data Collection
collection.desc: We may collect the following personal data to operate the site and provide services:
collection.required: Required Information: Nickname, Email Address, Password, Mobile Number, Date of Birth
collection.optional: Optional Information: Activity records on the site (posts, comments, etc.)
collection.logs: Access records, IP address, browser information

usage.title: 2. Purpose of Use
usage.desc: Collected data is used for the following purposes:
usage.community: Service provision such as forums and community features
usage.law: Verification to comply with legal obligations

storage.title: 3. Data Retention and Deletion
storage.member: Membership data: Deleted immediately upon user withdrawal
storage.legal: Data retained as required by law will be securely stored for the necessary period
storage.user_request: Data will be deleted immediately upon user request or upon expiration of the retention period.
storage.irreversible: Deleted data is processed to be irrecoverable.

sharing.title: 4. Data Sharing and Provision
sharing.desc: We do not share personal information with third parties except in the following cases:
sharing.consent: When the user has given prior consent
sharing.trusted: When cooperating with trusted third-party partners to provide services

cookies.title: 5. Cookie Policy
cookies.desc: Cookies are used to enhance user experience. Users may refuse cookie use through browser settings, which may limit some functions.

rights.title: 6. User Rights
rights.desc: Users have the following rights regarding their personal information:
rights.view_edit_delete: Request to view, edit, or delete personal data
rights.withdraw: Request to withdraw consent or restrict processing
rights.contact: ** Contact Method: Please reach out via the email address below for inquiries related to your personal information.

protection.title: 7. Data Protection Measures
protection.desc: We take the following measures to protect your personal data:
protection.ssl: Use of SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) technology

changes.title: 8. Policy Changes
changes.desc: This Privacy Policy may be updated as needed. We will notify users of any changes through the site or email. Changes take effect upon notice.

contact.title: 9. Contact Information
contact.desc: For any questions regarding this Privacy Policy or to exercise your rights, please contact us at:
